column1: Kata Robata////Also worth trying are the sushi items that are not normally included in the platter.  The uni
column2: when they have it is exceptionally tasty and so is the foie gras.  Interestingly enough
column3: this is one of the only places that does Kohada(gizzard shad) correctly.  It's a great tasting fish but the vinegar taste sometimes is off-putting to newbies.
